benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/payments - Trigger a payment using the account external key

covered: POST Valid Payload covered by TC01-TC07 with 201 responses and creation of Payment resource
Required header validations (TC10) and 201 with valid payloads (TC03, TC04, TC05)
404 for unknown account (TC07) and 404 for empty database (TC20)
400 for missing externalKey and malformed payloads (TC08, TC09)
Account with no default payment method but with provided paymentMethodId (TC06)
Regression tests for pluginProperty and backward compatibility (TC25-TC26)
Performance tests for response time under normal/peak/stress (TC27-TC29)
Documentation accessibility and correctness of API docs (TC30)
gaps: Forbidden authorization scenario not explicitly tested beyond 401
Rate limiting / throttling tests for high request load
Caching headers verification for responses (ETag, Cache-Control)
Content-type validation and unsupported media type handling
Internal server error scenario (500) not simulated (only 502/503/504)
Pagination tests are not applicable to POST but no idempotency tests exist
recommendations: Add a test for idempotent/duplicate submission behavior (e.g., resubmitting the same payload yields appropriate handling)
Add tests for 403 Forbidden when access is properly restricted
Add rate limiting tests and verify retry-after behavior if applicable
Add tests validating caching headers on responses from POST /payments (if applicable)
Add tests for unsupported media types and content-type handling
Add a test simulating internal server error (500) and verify 500 responses and logging
